Data.value: If you have another card not listed here or would like to pin or merge other cards to your account (max 2 cards), please call our Clubcard Helpline at 1300-13-1313.
Since joining Clubcard, you may have used various Clubcards. Below are the card numbers that we hold in this account.
We will only send statements to the primary card holder.

If you have another card not listed here or would like to leave the scheme, please contact us on 1300-13-1313. You can also add one other person from your household to your account, the other person will need to be present when you call.
Please note: For any joint or merged cards, all points collected from various Clubcards will be added to the primary card holder account.

If you have another card not listed here or would like to leave the scheme, please contact us on 1300-13-1313. You can also add one other person from your household to your account, the other person will need to be present when you call.
